nodes.title: Fixed memory leaks and don't rotate unless necessary
Fix android compatibility with newer RN versions
Change iOS Deployment Target to iOS 7
Handle images from RCT Image store
fix: don't throw outside promise creation
Android: get EXIF orientation from content:// URI on r24+ (#86)
fixed issue with duplciate image name when comperessing within a for …
Fix:[iOS] Resize mode cover doesn't match RN Image cover
update podspec file to include `React-RCTImage` as a dependency
Implement http/https remote images for Android.
Fix resize image for share extension maintaining aspect ratio of passed size
Fixed the image loading for share extensions
feat: add different resize modes and onlyScaleDown options
Fix RCTImageLoader import to fix undefined symbol
Using the public class for lazy loading the module
Do not crash during rotation on some devices
fix: support customizing of android tools versions
androidで容量の大きい画像を圧縮しようとした際にOOMになるバグ対応
fix(ios): `outputPath` on iOS can contain an absolute path
Add parameter outputImageName to method createResizedImage
fix error: ImageResizer is not public
`outputPath` on iOS can contain an absolute path
[Dependencies] Update react peerDependency semver range to support 16-alpha + beta
Fix rotate exception caused by Bitmap.createBitmap
Remove deprecated method for RN 0.47 compat
Fixed iOS methods: saveFile, generateFilePath, saveImage,
Unify returned value between Android and iOS implementation
Fix example to work with the specified React Native version
Update Android SDK Build Tools version
Minor Android fixes for empty/failed return paths
Add note to README explaining `file:` prefix
fixed gradle so that the project can be compiled in isolation
Enable the android image resizer to handle base64 formated Uri strings.
Added support for PNG compression for iOS
Getting rid of deprecation warning on iOS
reduced memory footprint by using inSampleSize
